attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would ask all that look at this petition to know that tony blair when he tells us all on tv that we will stamp out on such knife crimes ,but on the first month of this year i myself was faced by a man next door with a large knife pulling it out from the back of his jeans and lunged towards me ,if i was not standing at my front door i would not me typing today i would me another number to knife crime.this was cauht all on cctv tape aswell ,but even know it was clear and on cctv tape,the only affence he got done for was the damage of my front door due to me slaming the door on the knife,this man had a slap on the wrist by the local police and an 80.00 pound on the spot fine.lets ask our selfs is mr blair true to his word and do'es he mean what he tells us all ? if anyone would like a copy of this crime i would be glad to send one out to anyone for free e-mail me marksaff1@aol.com

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Statements that don't actually request any action
